iops.description: Number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) that the volume supports.

throughput.description: The throughput, in mebibyte per second (MiB/s).

type.description: Volume type. Valid options are `gp3`, `gp2`, `io1`, `standard`, `st1` and `sc1`. See [EBS Volume Types](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/EBSVolumeTypes.html).

volumesPerInstance.description: Number of EBS volumes with this configuration to attach to each EC2 instance in the instance group (default is 1).
